sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Examples howe mortall synne maketh the synners inobedyentes to haue many paynes and doloures within the fyre of hell And fyrst example of a father of an housholde the whiche sawe two pondes and the tourmentes of hell. Fleur des commandements de Dieu. English. Selections.
[72] p.
Imprynted by me Robert Wyer: dwellynge at the sygne of seynt Ioh[a]n Euangelyste in seynt Martyns Parysshe, besyde Charynge Crosse, [[London] : [1555?]]
Consists of selections from leaves 230-241 of "Ihesus. The floure of the commaundementes of god" (STC 23876) which is a translation of: La fleur des commandements de Dieu--STC. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Signatures: A-I⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
Examples howe mortall synne maketh the synners inobedyentes to haue many paynes and doloures within the fyre of hell And fyrst example of a father of an housholde the whiche sawe two pondes and the tourmentes of hell. Fleur des commandements de Dieu. English. Selections.
[72] p.
Imprynted by me Robert Wyer: dwellynge at the sygne of seynt Ioh[a]n Euangelyste in seynt Martyns Parysshe, besyde Charynge Crosse, [[London] : [1555?]]
Consists of selections from leaves 230-241 of "Ihesus. The floure of the commaundementes of god" (STC 23876) which is a translation of: La fleur des commandements de Dieu--STC. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Signatures: A-I⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
me Robert Wyer:
the sygne of seynt Ioh[a]n Euangelyste in seynt Martyns Parysshe, besyde Charynge Crosse
